ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Exp & Seb question -- was Re: AC
ygData.msgSnippet: ... A very similar thing happened to us at the bridge area both yesterday and the day before but in our case it was ilis and krup frogs that popped in. They
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, May 25/00, Sylly Songsynger <jgs@...> wrote:
>
> When we broke in, we cleared to the first bridge and were fighting a froog
> when a Shroom (myconid warrior? reever?) appeared out of nowhere. He got
> messed and we kept fighting. Then another shroom. And another, and another
> and we ran back to the zone for ease of CR. Some managed to camp out,
> cleric gated, a few died inc me. But my question is - what causes these
> Shrooms to agro? This is the second time I have seen this in this same spot
> with about the same results. And we were careful not to use an AE - just
> doing the normal kill froog thing. Anyone know? Anyone been to the lower
> levels in Seb?

A very similar thing happened to us at the bridge area both yesterday
and the day before but in our case it was ilis and krup frogs that
popped in. They obviously broke something when they fixed the various
pathing exploits people found in there in the last patch, because we'd
been fighting there many times before the patch without this happening.
Of course, because this bug in no way benefits players, don't hold your
breath waiting for it to be fixed.


--
